title: Fire dragon hide
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

| Name                                                           | Dragon hide |
| :------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| Size to wear                                                   | Any         |
| [Armour Class](/Armour_class "Armour class")                   | 3           |
| [Encumbrance rating](/Encumbrance_rating "Encumbrance rating") | -11         |
| Maximum Enchantment                                            | +0          |
| Grants                                                         | rF++, rC-   |
| Time to Wear                                                   | 5           |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | The scaly skin of a common true dragon. It can be fashioned into proper armour, but even in its raw form it provides great protection from the effects of fire but renders its wearer susceptible to cold. |

**Fire dragon hide** is the hide of a [fire dragon](/Fire_dragon "Fire dragon"), gained by butchering its [corpse](/Corpse "Corpse"). Although it provides fairly lousy physical defense considering its EV penalty, it does provide the wearer with two ranks of [fire](/Fire "Fire") resistance in exchange for one rank of [cold](/Cold "Cold") vulnerability, and you can use a [scroll of enchant armour](/Scroll_of_enchant_armour "Scroll of enchant armour") on it to make [fire dragon armour](/Fire_dragon_armour "Fire dragon armour"), a much better piece of equipment.

## History

Fire dragon hides were removed in [0.19](/0.19 "0.19")

Prior to [0.10](/0.10 "0.10"), this item was known merely as "dragon hide". It was renamed to avoid confusion with other dragon hides.

| Miscellaneous                 | [Hat](/Hat "Hat") • [Helmet](/Helmet "Helmet") • [Cloak](/Cloak "Cloak") • [Scarf](/Scarf "Scarf") • [Gloves](/Gloves "Gloves") • [Boots](/Boots "Boots") • [Barding](/Barding "Barding")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |

html:
Fire dragon hide

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
Name Dragon hide
Size to wear Any
Armour Class 3
Encumbrance rating -11
Maximum Enchantment +0
Grants rF++, rC-
Time to Wear 5


The scaly skin of a common true dragon. It can be fashioned into proper armour, but even in its raw form it provides great protection from the effects of fire but renders its wearer susceptible to cold.

Fire dragon hide is the hide of a fire dragon, gained by butchering its corpse. Although it provides fairly lousy physical defense considering its EV penalty, it does provide the wearer with two ranks of fire resistance in exchange for one rank of cold vulnerability, and you can use a scroll of enchant armour on it to make fire dragon armour, a much better piece of equipment.

History

Fire dragon hides were removed in 0.19

Prior to 0.10, this item was known merely as "dragon hide". It was renamed to avoid confusion with other dragon hides.
